import{surveyData_de}from'./surveyData_de';import{surveyData_en}from'./surveyData_en';// Export localized survey data
export const surveyData={de:surveyData_de,en:surveyData_en};// Default language
export const defaultLanguage='de';// Function to get survey data based on language
export const getSurveyData=function(){let language=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultLanguage;return surveyData[language]||surveyData[defaultLanguage];};
